publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1403 Ms Margaret Curran: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S2M-1403 Ms Margaret Curran: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan
